title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Turning Complexity into Effortless CX with Amazon Connect (MAM211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Connect 将复杂性转化为轻松的客户体验 (MAM211)
abstract: Discover how Amazon Connect, an AI-driven, composable, and industry-leading platform—paired with NTT DATA’s end-to-end lifecycle services’ balanced approach to AI innovation and human expertise—can unlock new levels of customer experience (CX), simplify complexity, and boost operational efficiency. NTT DATA leverages Amazon Connect to deliver flexible, composable CX solutions that scale with your business. This session will showcase real-world use cases where organizations have transformed their CX through intelligent automation, seamless integration, and AI-driven insights—equipping you with practical strategies to accelerate innovation, reduce costs, and deliver exceptional, personalized interactions at scale. This presentation is brought to you by NTT DATA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解Amazon Connect这一AI驱动、可组合的行业领先平台——结合NTT DATA端到端生命周期服务在AI创新与人类专业知识之间的平衡方法——如何释放客户体验(CX)的新水平，简化复杂性，并提升运营效率。NTT DATA利用Amazon Connect提供灵活、可组合的CX解决方案，随您的业务扩展。本次会议将展示真实用例，展现组织如何通过智能自动化、无缝集成和AI驱动的洞察转变其CX——为您提供实用策略，以加速创新、降低成本，并大规模提供卓越的个性化交互。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NTT DATA提供。
